mapper.select: select su.id, su.real_name from sys_user su, sys_user_role sur, sys_role sr where su.enabled = #{enabled} and su.id = sur.user_id and sur.role_id = sr.id and sr.role_code = #{settlementRoleCode}

select r.role_code as roleCode, r.role_cn_name as roleCnName, d.dept_name as deptName, c.city_name as cityName, u.* from sys_user u inner join ba_city c on c.id = u.city inner join sys_user_role ur on ur.user_id = u.id inner join sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id inner join sys_dept d on d.id = u.dept_id where u.del_flag=#{delFlag} and r.role_code=#{roleCode} and d.id=#{deptId}
